title: Why Invest in El Salvador
item_0_description: A predictable business environment supported by sound policy and long-term commitment.
item_1_description: Central America's gateway with access to major markets and trade routes
item_2_description: Improved public safety and stability that support long-term investment decisions.
item_3_description: Tax benefits, free trade zones, and attractive investment packages
item_4_description: Bilingual talent pool with technical expertise and strong work ethic
item_5_description: World-class connectivity, logistics, and technology infrastructure
